        @GetMapping(value="/list")
public PageDTO<PlayerShortDTO> getList(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.String surname,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.String patronymic,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                   java.time.LocalDate minBirthdate,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                   java.time.LocalDate maxBirthdate,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.Boolean isLocked,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.Boolean isDisabled,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.String searchString,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                   java.lang.Integer pageNum)
        Returns requested page with players for current player filter.
        Parameters:
        name - the player name.
        surname - the player surname.
        patronymic - the player patronymic.
        minBirthdate - the player minimum birthdate.
        maxBirthdate - the player maximum birthdate.
        isLocked - the locking flag.
        isDisabled - the disabling flag.
        searchString - the search string.
        pageSize - the page size.
        pageNum - the page number.
        Returns:
        page with short players details.

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> update(@PathVariable
                                                                                                  int id,
                                                                                                  @RequestBody @Validated(value=PlayerDTO.UpdateCheck.class)
                                                                                                  PlayerDTO playerDTO)
                                                                                           throws UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                                                                                  ForbiddenAccessException,
                                                                                                  org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException,
                                                                                                  ResourceNotFoundException
        Update and save player details by player identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - the player identifier.
        playerDTO - the player new details.
        Returns:
        no content.
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if authorization is missing.
        ForbiddenAccessException - if user don't have permission to update this player details.
        org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if method argument not valid.
        ResourceNotFoundException - if player not found.

      • assign

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}/assignment")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> assign(@PathVariable
                                                                                                             int id,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                             java.lang.Integer userId,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                             java.lang.Boolean force)
                                                                                                      throws UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                                                                                             ForbiddenAccessException,
                                                                                                             ResourceNotFoundException,
                                                                                                             ResourceCannotUpdateException
        Assign player to user.
        Parameters:
        id - the player identifier.
        userId - the user identifier.
        force - true if assigning must be override, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        no content.
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if authorization is missing.
        ForbiddenAccessException - if user don't have permission to update this player details.
        ResourceNotFoundException - if player or user not found.
        ResourceCannotUpdateException - if player already assigned or user details mismatch.

        no content.
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if authorization is missing.

        ResourceNotFoundException - if player not found.
